taskbody.prereq: A tab cannot exist outside of a tabbed pane. The following steps explain how to add a tab to a tabbed pane, and assume that you have an existing tabbed pane in your diagram.

step.cmd: In the Design tab, right-click the tabbed pane and select Add Tab.

postreq.p: You do not need to set an event of type on-click on the tab, even if dynamic, unless you want to post specific information.
The generated on-click event posts the widget-group-ref that is forced to default value "form".
A reload transition must be defined in the pageflow to manage the generated on-click event, and the action ApplyFilterProcess must be called in the transition.
